title: The history of the persecutions of the Protestants by the French king in the principality of Orange from the year 1660 to the year 1687 with a particular account of the author's fall through the violence of the persecution / written by Monsieur Pineton.
author: Chambrun, Jacques Pineton de, 1637-1689.
publisher: Printed for William Rogers and Samuel Smith,
notes: Translated and abridged from his Les larmes.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
